name: glary
content:
glary adjective
(LIGHT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
producing unpleasantly bright or strong light, or filled with unpleasantly bright or strong light: The sun was hot and glary. In glary conditions it can be difficult to see the screen.
More examplesFewer examplesIt was difficult driving - the sun was really glary.The set design is bright and glary.Make sure the desks are positioned so that the students do not face a window or glary area.
